entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edmonton (Int'l Aprt)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -26.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Int'l Airport 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -26.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -29.5°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 8.
